backend/main.mo: Actor defines challenge, user, recording, and chat types, initializes storage and authorization mixins, manages challenge maps and assignment ID normalization.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping frontend files to assignment‑ID compatibility, canonicalization, and diagnostic logging changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including hooks, screens, components, and i18n resources.
frontend/index.css: Imports the main project stylesheet from src for theme token forwarding.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache‑busting meta tags, embedded build version, and root div loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing authentication gates, URL‑synced screen state, update detection, and deleted‑challenge notices.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing centered mobile‑style container and suppressing the migration banner.
frontend/src/components/AppUpdatingNotic: Fullscreen notice shown during forced app version refresh with spinner and status text.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentDetail: Renders assignment text with bolded step headings by parsing lines for Step N: prefixes.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: UI for recording, reviewing, and uploading audio with share dialog, progress indicators, and delete handling.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Auth button that handles Internet Identity login/logout and updates React Query cache.
frontend/src/components/AuthIconButton.t: Compact icon-only auth control managing Internet Identity login/logout with loading states.
frontend/src/components/AutoInvitationRe: Automatically redeems stored invitation codes and manages UI states, errors, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeChatTab: Chat interface for challenges with message sending, editing, replying, and auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeDeleted: Popup dialog informing users a challenge was deleted, with scrollable content and dismiss action.
frontend/src/components/ChatReplyReferen: Displays a referenced message snippet and author for chat replies, resolving data from cache or fetch.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: Developer debugging panel showing auth info with controls to refresh state and trigger auth.
frontend/src/components/InfoPopups.tsx: Renders two informational popups with translated content triggered by buttons.
frontend/src/components/PopupBodySection: Renders popup sections with headings and text, supporting preformatted content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCompletio: Gate that blocks app until user profile has a name, showing a completion form if missing.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateGate.t: Displays loading and error states for a React Query request and renders children once data is available.
frontend/src/components/RecordingFeedbac: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/RecordingLevelMe: Renders a visual meter showing normalized audio level with color-coded feedback.
Custom audio player supporting play/pause, seeking, and time display using an HTMLAudioElement.
frontend/src/components/RecordingWavefor: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/SharedPopup.tsx: Wrapper around shadcn dialogs providing consistent popup layout, scrolling, and trigger behavior.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button that toggles between light and dark themes using a custom theme hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUpdateGuard.ts: Checks app version on startup and triggers a controlled hard refresh if a mismatch is detected.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecording.ts: Manages microphone recording, audio level analysis, timers, and lifecycle cleanup for recording sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Provides authentication status and principal string derived from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query keys and helpers for backend data fetching, including assignment ID normalization and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuppressMigrationB: Hook that scans DOM and uses a MutationObserver to hide unwanted migration banners.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Hook that manages light/dark theme based on localStorage or system preference and toggles CSS classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserChallengeStatu: Queries the backend for the user’s challenge status using react-query with authentication checks.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nContext.tsx: Provides a translation context using English translations and helpers for nested key lookup.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the English translation dictionary for the app with structured text for screens and UI elements.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables and dark mode theme definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint that sets up react-query, identity provider, global CSS, and renders the app.
UI placeholder for users with no active challenge, including state refresh and navigation actions.
Challenge creation and management placeholder with extensive query/mutation hooks and invitation handling.
Displays challenge state summary with options to navigate to edit mode and view info popups.
Main in-challenge screen handling tabs, day selection, participants, audio recordings, and challenge state recovery.
frontend/src/screens/UnifiedEntryMenu.ts: Entry menu deciding navigation based on auth and challenge status, displaying login/create/enjoy actions.
frontend/src/utils/appUrlState.ts: Reads, writes, and clears navigation-related URL query parameters without reloading.
frontend/src/utils/appVersion.ts: Retrieves and parses the app version from meta tags or HTML, ignoring placeholder values.
frontend/src/utils/assignmentIdCompat.ts: Provides compatibility mappings between hyphenated and underscored assignment IDs and utilities for error parsing.
frontend/src/utils/assignments.ts: Defines the fixed daily challenge assignments with canonical IDs, titles, and detailed content.
frontend/src/utils/backendBuildInfo.ts: Caches backend build info and exposes helpers to read, log, and clear the stored identifier.
frontend/src/utils/challengeContext.ts: Stores and retrieves the active challenge ID in sessionStorage for persistence across refreshes.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDayFormat.ts: Formats a challenge day into a human-readable weekday and date using the start timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDeletedNotic: Persists a flag in sessionStorage indicating a deleted-challenge notice should be shown.
frontend/src/utils/challengeRecovery.ts: Resets all challenge-related client state, clearing persisted IDs, URL state, and invalidating/removing React Query caches.
frontend/src/utils/hardRefresh.ts: Performs a cache-busted hard refresh with loop protection and provides a method to clear the protection flag.
frontend/src/utils/invitationCodes.ts: Generates random uppercase alphanumeric invitation codes using a limited character set.
frontend/src/utils/invitationLinks.ts: Builds, parses, persists, and clears challenge invitation link parameters while preserving navigation state.
frontend/src/utils/recordingDayIndex.ts: Validates and converts day values between UI (1–7) and backend (0–6) formats.
Logs sanitized upload attempt, failure, and success metadata for recording operations along with app and backend versions.
frontend/src/utils/recordingIds.ts: Normalizes and validates recording day and assignment IDs, enforcing canonical backend-compatible assignment identifiers.
Extracts and sanitizes error messages, mapping backend errors to safe, user-friendly messages with special handling for challenge and assignment errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, persist, and clear URL parameters across query and hash routing, with sessionStorage fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/versionCheck.ts: Implements version checking by comparing the running app version with a cache‑busted fetch of the latest HTML and returns structured results. Includes a deprecated wrapper for legacy refresh checks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, known issue about production assignment ID mismatch, and lists three existing features focused on ID compatibility, canonicalization, and diagnostic logging.
